DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial new formulation GEN-003 treatment HSV-2 genital infection . Eligible subject enter baseline period collect anogenital swab 28 consecutive day prior randomization . Each subject receive 3 dos 21 day interval complete second set anogenital swab 28 consecutive day third dose . Each subject follow one year third dose .
